contents:
美版Amazon加集運？

或者旅遊時買，或叫朋友代購？


只是外國版3G 4G 5G可能制式不同，未必能在支那使用



Samsung A51 6GB RAM 128GB ROM，我在香港買港行是HKD$2,480，美版AMAZON是USD$284.98（約HKD$2,222.844）


https://www.amazon.com/Samsung-Galaxy-SM-A515F-DS-Unlocked/dp/B082YG1L4B/





USD$422.02


https://www.amazon.com/Samsung-Eo-ag900bweg-Premium-Bluetooth-Headphone/dp/B00UCUJDVU/





USD$404.61 + USD$150.00 shipping

https://www.amazon.com/Samsung-Galaxy-A51-SM-A515F-128GB/dp/B083NVRJ55/



還有比較出名的Google Pixel，and OS版本可以不斷昇級。還有iPhone在amazon也能購買
